abstract: Mauritania's army conducts cross-border air raid in Mali aimed at preventing attack by insurgent cell of Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb.
snippet: Mauritania’s army conducted an air raid in a forest across the border in Mali on Thursday, aimed at preventing an attack by an insurgent cell there linked to Al Qaeda, the Defense Ministry said.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Al Qaeda in the Islamic Maghreb

lead_paragraph: Mauritania’s army conducted an air raid in a forest across the border in Mali on Thursday, aimed at preventing an attack by an insurgent cell there linked to Al Qaeda, the Defense Ministry said.

headline.main: Mauritania Raids Qaeda Group in Mali
headline.print_headline: Mauritania Raids Qaeda Group in Mali
